name: MOM Darwin
description:
A modern co-living and private accommodation provider in the heart of Darwin CBD. We aim to provide guests with the best place to stay in Darwin. We have a vast sun deck with two massive pools, a pool deck bar and lots of places to chill out or party if you choose to. We offer a range of shared and private accommodation with and without an ensuite all air-conditioned with fans as well. We also know how important having access to power is to charge your devices, so we have made sure that every guest has their own USB and PowerPoint in every room. Digital nomads will also have access to our newly created co-working space to keep them working on the go.

Booking Terms and Conditions

Age Requirement: All guests must be 18 years or older to stay at our hostel. Valid identification is required at check-in.

Booking Confirmation: A booking is confirmed once you receive a confirmation email from us. Please ensure all details are correct and contact us immediately if there are any discrepancies.

Payment: Full payment is required at the time of booking. We accept major credit cards and other specified payment methods.

Cancellation Policy:

Free cancellation is available up to 48 hours prior to the check-in date for standard bookings.
Cancellations for standard bookings made less than 48 hours before check-in will incur a charge equivalent to the first night’s stay.
Non-refundable rates are non-refundable.

Check-in and Check-out:

Check-in time is from 2:00 PM.
Check-out time is by 10:00 AM.

Early check-in and late check-out are subject to availability and may incur additional charges.

No Show Policy: If you do not arrive on the scheduled check-in date and have not contacted us to cancel, the first night’s stay will be charged, and the remainder of the booking will be canceled.

House Rules:
Quiet hours are from 11:00 PM to 7:00 AM.
No smoking inside the hostel premises.
Respect other guests and hostel property.
No BYO allowed on site.

Liability: The hostel is not responsible for any loss, theft, or damage to personal belongings. Please use the lockers provided for your valuables.

Changes to Booking: Any changes to your booking must be requested at least 48 hours prior to check-in and are subject to availability.

Force Majeure: The hostel is not liable for any failure to perform its obligations due to events beyond its control, such as natural disasters, strikes, or other unforeseen circumstances.

Contact Information: For any questions or concerns regarding your booking, please contact us at info@momdarwin.net.au

groupInformation.terms:
All guests are required to provide valid photo ID at check-in. Failure to provide government-issued, valid photo identification will result in your booking being cancelled by YHA.

We require taking a profile photo of all guests staying in shared rooms or private rooms with a shared bathroom. As you will be staying in a shared environment with other guests it is important that we can identify who is in our property at all times to ensure maximum safety and security for all guests. If you do not wish to have your photo taken, we will not be able to accommodate you. If you are staying in a private room with a private ensuite bathroom we will still require a photo ID upon check-in to confirm your identity.

If you require your booking to a specific allocation of guests in rooms please email us this allocation 48 hours ahead of time at the latest. Otherwise we may not be able to accommodate your request.
groupInformation.cancellationTerms:
Any cancellations or reduction in numbers are required to give 28 days notice for free cancellation. Please note any changes are subject to availability. 

Any cancellations or reduction in numbers made after this time period are non refundable.
